SELECT SI_SHOBATSU.SI_SHOBATSU_ID ,
SI_SHOBATSU.MS_SENIN_ID , SI_SHOBATSU.SHOBATSU_NAME, SI_SHOBATSU.SHOBATSU_DATE, SI_SHOBATSU.REMARKS,
SI_SHOBATSU.DELETE_FLAG , SI_SHOBATSU.SEND_FLAG , SI_SHOBATSU.VESSEL_ID , SI_SHOBATSU.DATA_NO , SI_SHOBATSU.USER_KEY , SI_SHOBATSU.RENEW_DATE , SI_SHOBATSU.RENEW_USER_ID , SI_SHOBATSU.TS
FROM SI_SHOBATSU
WHERE SI_SHOBATSU.DELETE_FLAG = 0

INSERT INTO SI_SHOBATSU( SI_SHOBATSU_ID ,
MS_SENIN_ID ,
SHOBATSU_NAME, SHOBATSU_DATE, REMARKS,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :SI_SHOBATSU_ID ,
:MS_SENIN_ID ,
:SHOBATSU_NAME, :SHOBATSU_DATE, :REMARKS,
:DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE SI_SHOBATSU SET MS_SENIN_ID = :MS_SENIN_ID ,
SHOBATSU_NAME = :SHOBATSU_NAME, SHOBATSU_DATE = :SHOBATSU_DATE, REMARKS = :REMARKS,
DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE SI_SHOBATSU_ID = :SI_SHOBATSU_ID AND TS = :TS
